    #include<iostream>
    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
        int TC;
        cin>>TC;
        long int a;
     
        while(TC--)
        {
         cin>>a;
            if(a&1)
            {
            cout<<"BOB"<<endl;
            }
        else
        {
            cout<<"ALICE"<<endl;
        }
        }
     
     
     
        return 0;
    }
